thread.title: First Lady Melania Trump Wears Karl Lagerfeld Couture to Meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu
thread.title_full: First Lady Melania Trump Wears Karl Lagerfeld Couture to Meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu

title: First Lady Melania Trump Wears Karl Lagerfeld Couture to Meet Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu
text: Melania Trump Wears Karl Lagerfeld Couture to Meet Israel’s Prime Minister February 15, 2017 11:33 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: Getty Images After rumors swirled that Melania Trump would be sporting one of Karl Lagerfeld’s elegant creations for the inauguration, the First Lady had her moment when the designer created a white cashmere skirtsuit for today’s meeting with the Israeli prime minister at the White House. This outfit, with its double-breasted placket and nipped-in waist, was in line with the tailored and military-influenced separates that Trump has favored during the campaign and since entering the White House. This latest look furthers Trump’s penchant for sleek silhouettes in one-note shades. Her recent meeting with Akie Abe saw her in a Calvin Klein ankle-grazing dress, while to cast her ballot, Trump wore a Michael Kors sheath under Balmain’s tailored topper. Fast becoming the first lady's signature, a pair of killer heels grounded the look for a tonal finish. Photo: Getty Images In This Story: Melania Trump Recommended For You
